definition: turbid flow/muddy waters/fig. a contemptible person/fig. corrupt or disgraceful social trends
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: The granularity analysis results show typical features of turbidite deposits.
sentences.chinese: 粒度分析表明其具有典型的濁流特徵。

pavilion in the air (idiom); unrealistic Utopian construction/castles in Spain/imaginary future plans
